title: Debate Recap, Impeachment & HK Bill
itunes:title: Debate Recap, Impeachment & HK Bill
description:
Kevin spoke with Garrett Ventry, former spokesman for Senator Chuck Grassley and the Senate Judiciary Committee, Max Burns, Democratic Strategist; Contributor at The Daily Beast and The Independent, and Emily Wilkins, Bloomberg Congressional reporter


They discussed last nights Democratic debate, impeachment, 2020 Hong Kong and Facebook.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
